snippet: The tablet, Belsomra, temporarily blocks chemicals known as orexins that control the sleep cycle.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves drug Belsomra, new type of sleeping pill designed to help people with insomnia stay asleep, by Merck.
lead_paragraph: The tablet, Belsomra, temporarily blocks chemicals known as orexins that control the sleep cycle.

headline.main: The F.D.A. Approves a Pill to Help People Stay Asleep
headline.print_headline: The F.D.A. Approves a Pill to Help People Stay Asleep
